doctext: carabineros have found four packets containing explosives at the foot of high tension electric tower no 657 of the colbun-machicura line.    the packets were found in plot no 5, el romeral sector, 2 km west of southern highway no 5.    the land belongs to ramon urrutia blanco.    each packet contained 2 kg of amonium gelignite, detonators, fuses, and timing devices.    specialized personnel believe that the bombs were planted a few days ago so that they could be activated at any time.
